local_projects.name: Prize-Picks-Predictions
local_projects.summary: A Flask web app that uses machine learning models to generate PrizePicks-style prediction insights.
description: Prize-Picks-Predictions ingests historical player and game data, runs it through trained machine learning models, and surfaces simple over/under style suggestions.
The app focuses on interpretability and clean UI so users can quickly see model outputs, confidence levels, and recent performance.

local_projects.name: LeetCode Tracker
local_projects.summary: A simple dashboard to keep track of LeetCode progress over time.
description: LeetCode Tracker helps visualize solved problems by difficulty, topic, and week.
The goal is to give a calm overview of progress rather than a noisy dashboard.

local_projects.name: Study Planner
local_projects.summary: A minimal study planning web app for courses, tasks, and deadlines.
description: Study Planner lets you organize courses, assignments, and exams in a clean, distraction-free interface.
It focuses on a small set of features done well instead of trying to replace a full project management tool.

local_projects.name: Notes API
local_projects.summary: A lightweight REST API for notes with authentication and tagging.
description: Notes API is a small backend service designed for learning authentication, CRUD patterns, and clean API design.
It is intentionally small but structured like a real production service, making it a good teaching/project base.
